page.title: 08ATTITUDES TO THE AREA
page.content: We prepared a questionaire and using it intervewied a total of{25 people. We visited 4 seperate places, in order to obtain a varied cross-section of the people living in the area. We first asked how often the people used the Cornish Leisure World at Carlyon Bay. 10 people said the have never used it, 9 people used it less than once every 6 months. 1 person said they went there about once every month, and another once every 2 weeks. 4 people went more often than once every 2 weeks. The area does seem to be very popular; 24 people said they liked the area; only 1 person said they did not, out of the people we asked.
